text: Lucette Michaux-Chevry (5 March 1929 – 9 September 2021) was a French politician. She was the President of the Regional Council of Guadeloupe between 1992 and 2004.Official page on the French senate website She was born in Saint-Claude, Guadeloupe. She was Mayor of Basse-Terre from 1995 until 2001 and again from 2008 until 2011. Michaux-Chevry was elected to the French Senate 1995. Michaux-Chevry died on 9 September 2021 at the age of 92.Lucette Michaux-Chevry, ancienne ministre de Jacques Chirac, est décédée ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:French mayors Category:People from Guadeloupe
title: Lucette Michaux-Chevry
